to.sven.androidrccar.host.test.logic.handler

Class AbstractTestCaseForHostMessageHandler<THandler extends AbstractHostMessageHandler<?>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • AndroidTestCase
      • to.sven.androidrccar.host.test.logic.handler.AbstractTestCaseForHostMessageHandler<THandler>
  • Type Parameters:
    THandler - The Handler to test.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AdjustSpeedMessageHandlerTest, AuthenticationMessageHandlerTest, RequestCameraHandlerTest, RotateCameraMessageHandlerTest, SetUpCyclicUpdateMessageHandlerTest, TurnCarMessageHandlerTest

    public class AbstractTestCaseForHostMessageHandler<THandler extends AbstractHostMessageHandler<?>>
extends AndroidTestCase
    Provides functionality that is used by every MessageHandler test. Provides initialization, replaying and verifying of IHostLogicHandlerFacade, IAccessoryCommunication and IHostDependencyContainer mocks. Provides creation of test subject.
    Author:
    sven
